title: PWA & Notifications

close_reason: Implemented in this session

title: Implement Badge API for pending item count
description: Update app badge with count of due + overdue items, handle iOS limitations gracefully
close_reason: Created useBadge composable with Badge API support, integrated into AppLayout for automatic updates when pending count changes

title: Create notification scheduling system
description: Schedule notifications at exact medication times, content format: 'LEFT eye: Ofloxacin 0.3% due now'
close_reason: Created notificationService.ts with scheduling, permission handling, content formatting (LEFT eye: Name due now), integrated into instances store for auto-scheduling on fetch

title: Handle notification permissions and fallbacks
description: Request permission on first use, handle denied state, show in-app alternatives
close_reason: Created useNotifications composable for permission handling and NotificationBanner.vue component with prompt/denied states

title: Add 'Add to Home Screen' prompt support
description: Detect installability, show subtle prompt (not aggressive), handle beforeinstallprompt event

title: Implement notification click handling
description: Click notification opens app to relevant item, focus existing window if open

title: Create OCI deployment scripts
close_reason: Closed

title: Install Firebase SDK and update dependencies
description: Run npm uninstall @supabase/supabase-js && npm install firebase. Add env vars for Firebase config.
close_reason: Firebase SDK installed, Supabase uninstalled

title: Remove Supabase and finalize migration
description: Delete src/lib/supabase.ts, remove VITE_SUPABASE_* env vars, verify all functionality works.

title: Testing & Deployment

close_reason: Enhanced unit tests for conflict detection: 5-minute spacing calculation, countdown timer logic, override behavior, edge cases for timing, multiple confirmations

description: Test due + overdue counting, exclude future items, handle edge cases
close_reason: Created useBadge.spec.ts with tests for due+overdue counting, exclusion of upcoming/snoozed/confirmed, edge cases, Badge API integration

title: Settings & Admin Features

title: Authentication System

title: Project Setup & Infrastructure
description: Initial Vue/Vite/TypeScript/Tailwind setup, Supabase connection, and project scaffolding
close_reason: All 9 project setup tasks complete: Vue/Vite/TypeScript, Tailwind CSS with design system, Pinia, Supabase client, Google Fonts, Vue Router, bottom tab layout, DB schema, and seed data.

title: Initialize Vue 3 + Vite + TypeScript project
description: Run npm create vue@latest with TypeScript, set up proper tsconfig, configure path aliases
close_reason: Vue 3 + Vite + TypeScript project initialized with Router, Pinia, Vitest, ESLint/Prettier. Type-check, tests, and build all pass.

title: Create base layout component with bottom tab bar
description: iOS-style bottom navigation with Dashboard, History, Settings tabs. Use Playful Geometric design system styling
close_reason: Created AppLayout and BottomTabBar components with iOS-style bottom navigation. Integrated Lucide icons. Safe area padding for iOS home indicator. Build and tests pass.

title: Configure Tailwind CSS with design system tokens
description: Install Tailwind, configure tailwind.config.js with Playful Geometric colors (background #FFFDF5, accent #8B5CF6, secondary #F472B6, tertiary #FBBF24, quaternary #34D399), typography (Outfit, Plus Jakarta Sans), shadows (hard 4px), radii
close_reason: Tailwind CSS v4 configured with Playful Geometric design system tokens: colors, typography, shadows, radii, animations. Demo page created. Build and tests pass.

title: Install and configure Pinia for state management
description: Set up Pinia store, configure persistence plugin for IndexedDB offline storage
close_reason: Pinia configured with pinia-plugin-persistedstate and localStorage for UI state. Created IndexedDB utilities (idb-keyval) for offline queue. Build and tests pass.

title: Set up Supabase client and environment variables
description: Install @supabase/supabase-js, create supabase.ts client, configure VITE_SUPABASE_URL and VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY env vars
close_reason: Supabase client configured with @supabase/supabase-js. Environment variables set up with .env.example. Database types created. Graceful fallback for missing config. Build and tests pass.

title: Create Supabase database schema
description: Create all tables: users, pets, items, item_schedules, daily_instances, confirmation_history, conflict_groups per SPEC.md SQL schema
close_reason: Created comprehensive Supabase SQL schema with all tables (users, pets, items, item_schedules, daily_instances, confirmation_history, conflict_groups), indexes, triggers, and RLS policies.

title: Set up Vue Router with tab-based navigation structure
description: Configure routes for Dashboard (/), History (/history), Settings (/settings), with bottom tab navigation layout
close_reason: Vue Router configured with routes for Dashboard (/), History (/history), Settings (/settings), Login (/login). Created placeholder views. Auth guard placeholder ready for auth store. Build and tests pass.

title: Create base layout component with bottom tab bar
description: iOS-style bottom navigation with Dashboard, History, Settings tabs. Use Playful Geometric design system styling

title: Import and configure Google Fonts (Outfit, Plus Jakarta Sans)
description: Add font imports to index.html or via @fontsource packages, configure Tailwind fontFamily
close_reason: Google Fonts (Outfit, Plus Jakarta Sans) configured via @fontsource-variable for self-hosted offline support. Fonts bundled in dist output. Build and tests pass.

title: Create seed data script with medications from SPEC
description: Script to populate Supabase with initial medications (Ofloxacin, Atropine, Amniotic, Prednisolone, Tacrolimus, Gabapentin) and food items (Breakfast, Dinner, Vitamins, Probiotics)
close_reason: Created seed data SQL with all medications from SPEC (Ofloxacin, Atropine, Amniotic, Prednisolone, Tacrolimus/Cyclosporine, Gabapentin), food items (Breakfast, Dinner, Vitamins, Probiotics), schedules, and default user.

title: Core Data Layer

close_reason: Core data layer complete (Realtime subscription deferred as P2)

close_reason: Created comprehensive TypeScript interfaces for all data models: Auth, Items, DailyInstances, History, Conflicts, Snooze, OfflineQueue, Settings, and API responses. Build and tests pass.
